features.title: Abstract Agent Logic
features.description: Move core agent execution logic and subprocess coordination into a shared base layer (BaseAgent and BaseClient).

features.title: Standardize Prompt Management
features.description: Consolidate prompt generation logic into agents/shared/prompts.py and use template-based prompt construction.

features.title: Improve Reliability & Observability
features.description: Unify telemetry and notification logic within the base classes; implement structured logging and real-time metrics.

features.title: Support for Extensibility
features.description: Design architecture to allow pluggable agent types using abstract base classes to define strict interfaces.

features.title: Strict Typing and Linting
features.description: Achieve 100% type coverage with mypy and adhere to PEP 8 via flake8.

features.title: Automated Verification Pipeline
features.description: Integrate run_tests.sh and custom verification logic into a robust CI/CD process.

features.title: Secure Credential & Secret Management
features.description: Manage Jira tokens, API keys, and other secrets using environment variables; zero-tolerance for hardcoded secrets.

features.title: Resilient Error Recovery & State Persistence
features.description: Implement mechanisms to save and restore agent state across sessions to resume from the last successful iteration.

features.title: Optimize Containerized Environments
features.description: Refactor Dockerfile for multi-stage builds and non-root execution for a reproducible environment.

features.title: Advanced Jira Workflow Integration
features.description: Automate full lifecycle of Jira tickets from In Progress to Code Review including branch management.
